amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds for the Bilateral Security Agreement Between the United States of America and Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 334 (Roll no. 304).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 334 (Roll no. 304).
